00009 PlayerShip::PlayerShip(Real mass, Vector3 position) : 
00010     PhysicsObject(ObjectType::SHIP, mass, position), m_reloadTime(0.2), m_lastShotCounter(0),
00011     m_canShoot(true), m_shootLeft(true)
00012 {
00013 }
00014 
00015 PlayerShip::PlayerShip(Real mass) :
00016     PhysicsObject(ObjectType::SHIP, mass), m_reloadTime(0.2), m_lastShotCounter(0),
00017     m_canShoot(true), m_shootLeft(true)
00018 {
00019 }

00021 PlayerShip::PlayerShip(const PlayerShip& copy) :
00022     PhysicsObject(ObjectType::SHIP, copy.getMass(), copy.getPosition()), m_reloadTime(copy.m_reloadTime), 
00023     m_lastShotCounter(copy.m_lastShotCounter), m_canShoot(copy.canShoot()), m_shootLeft(copy.m_shootLeft)
00024 {
00025 }
00026 
00027 bool PlayerShip::canShoot() const
00028 {
00029     return m_canShoot;
00030 }
00031 
00032 PhysicsObject PlayerShip::generateProjectile()
00033 {
00034     PhysicsObject projectile = PhysicsObject(ObjectType::PROJECTILE, 1, getPosition());
00035     projectile.setVelocity(getVelocity() + getHeading() * 1000);
00036     projectile.applyForce(getHeading() * 2000);
00037     projectile.setOrientation(getOrientation());
00038 
00039     if(m_shootLeft) {
00040         projectile.setPosition(getPosition() + 
00041             (getOrientation() * Vector3(80, -30, -30)));
00042     } else {
00043         projectile.setPosition(getPosition() + 
00044             (getOrientation() * Vector3(-80, -30, -30)));
00045     }
00046 
00047     m_shootLeft = !m_shootLeft;
00048     m_canShoot = false;
00049     m_lastShotCounter = 0;
00050     return projectile;
00051 }
00052 
00053 void PlayerShip::updatePhysics(Real timeElapsed) 
00054 {
00055     PhysicsObject::updatePhysics(timeElapsed);
00056     if(!m_canShoot) {
00057         m_lastShotCounter += timeElapsed;
00058         if(m_lastShotCounter >= m_reloadTime) {
00059             m_canShoot = true;
00060         }
00061     }
00062 }

00068 GameArena::GameArena(Real size) : m_arenaSize(size), m_ships(), m_projectiles(),
00069     m_listeners()
00070 {
00071 }
00072 
00073 void GameArena::addGameArenaListener(GameArenaListener * listener) 
00074 {
00075     m_listeners.push_back(listener);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void GameArena::removeGameArenaListener(GameArenaListener * listener)
00079 {
00080     for(int i = 0; i < m_listeners.size(); i++) {
00081         if(m_listeners[i] == listener) {
00082             m_listeners.erase(m_listeners.begin() + i);
00083         }
00084     }
00085 }
00086 
00087 PlayerShip * GameArena::addShip(PlayerShip ship)
00088 {
00089     PlayerShip * p_ship = new PlayerShip(ship);
00090     m_ships.push_back(p_ship);
00091     for(int i = 0; i < m_listeners.size(); i++) {
00092         m_listeners[i]->newPhysicsObject(p_ship);
00093     }
00094     return p_ship;
00095 }
00096 
00097 PhysicsObject * GameArena::addProjectile(PhysicsObject projectile)
00098 {
00099     PhysicsObject * p_projectile = new PhysicsObject(projectile);
00100     m_projectiles.push_back(p_projectile);
00101     for(int i = 0; i < m_listeners.size(); i++) {
00102         m_listeners[i]->newPhysicsObject(p_projectile);
00103     }
00104     return p_projectile;
00105 }
00106 
00107 bool GameArena::destroyProjectile(PhysicsObject * projectile) 
00108 {
00109     for(int i = 0; i < m_projectiles.size(); i++) {
00110         if(m_projectiles[i] == projectile) {
00111             delete projectile;
00112             m_projectiles.erase(m_projectiles.begin() + i);
00113             return true;
00114         }
00115     }
00116     return false;
00117 }
00118 
00119 PhysicsObject * GameArena::fireProjectileFromShip(PlayerShip * ship)
00120 {
00121     PhysicsObject projectile = ship->generateProjectile();
00122     return addProjectile(projectile);
00123 }
00124 
00125 std::vector<PhysicsObject *> * GameArena::getProjectiles() {
00126     return & m_projectiles;
00127 }
00128 
00129 std::vector<PlayerShip *> * GameArena::getShips() {
00130     return & m_ships;
00131 }
00132 
00133 void GameArena::updatePhysics(Real timeElapsed)
00134 {
00135     int i;
00136     for(i = 0; i < m_ships.size(); i++) {
00137         m_ships[i]->updatePhysics(timeElapsed);
00138         if(m_ships[i]->getPosition().x > m_arenaSize) {
00139             m_ships[i]->setPosition(m_ships[i]->getPosition() + Vector3(-(2 * m_arenaSize), 0, 0));
00140         } else if (m_ships[i]->getPosition().x < - m_arenaSize) {
00141             m_ships[i]->setPosition(m_ships[i]->getPosition() + Vector3((2 * m_arenaSize), 0, 0));
00142         }
00143 
00144         if(m_ships[i]->getPosition().y > m_arenaSize) {
00145             m_ships[i]->setPosition(m_ships[i]->getPosition() + Vector3(0, -(2 * m_arenaSize), 0));
00146         } else if (m_ships[i]->getPosition().y < - m_arenaSize) {
00147             m_ships[i]->setPosition(m_ships[i]->getPosition() + Vector3(0, (2 * m_arenaSize), 0));
00148         }
00149 
00150         if(m_ships[i]->getPosition().z > m_arenaSize) {
00151             m_ships[i]->setPosition(m_ships[i]->getPosition() + Vector3(0, 0, -(2 * m_arenaSize)));
00152         } else if (m_ships[i]->getPosition().z < - m_arenaSize) {
00153             m_ships[i]->setPosition(m_ships[i]->getPosition() + Vector3(0, 0, (2 * m_arenaSize)));
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00157     for(i = 0; i < m_projectiles.size(); i++) {
00158         m_projectiles[i]->updatePhysics(timeElapsed);
00159 
00160         if(m_projectiles[i]->getPosition().x > m_arenaSize || m_projectiles[i]->getPosition().x < - m_arenaSize
00161             || m_projectiles[i]->getPosition().y > m_arenaSize || m_projectiles[i]->getPosition().y < - m_arenaSize
00162             || m_projectiles[i]->getPosition().z > m_arenaSize || m_projectiles[i]->getPosition().z < - m_arenaSize) 
00163         {
00164             destroyProjectile(m_projectiles[i]);
00165             i--; // Kludgey, should fix this
00166         }
00167     }
00168 }
